       <div id="wrapbox17032787">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17032787">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17032787">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I perform a cultural analysis of a country?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17032787">
          <div id="boxatt17032787" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20080130">
              <a id="link_20080130" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080130,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808438}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Gives basic demographics of a country, plus overview of political system.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080165">
              <a id="link_20080165" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080165,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19903964}); ">
               Europa World Yearbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Demographics including health, welfare, and education.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080173">
              <a id="link_20080173" href="https://www.google.fr/webhp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080173,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20080173}); ">
               Google France
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080178">
              <a id="link_20080178" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080178,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706339}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Scholarly journal articles in French about your country's recent history and culture
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080185">
              <a id="link_20080185" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080185,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767749}); ">
               America History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               For Quebec
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080191">
              <a id="link_20080191" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.portal.euromonitor.com/portal/server.pt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080191,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904123}); ">
               Passport Reference via Euromonitor
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. See especially the "Consumer Lifestyle Reports" containing demographics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080198">
              <a id="link_20080198" href="http://www.gouv.qc.ca/portail/quebec/pgs/commun/plansite/?lang=en" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080198,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20080198}); ">
               Quebec Portal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080203">
              <a id="link_20080203" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080203,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Try a keyword search on your country to find books in French on local culture and customs.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

       <div id="wrapbox17032852">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17032852">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17032852">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I perform an economic analysis of a country, including advice to U.S. business persons?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17032852">
          <div id="boxatt17032852" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20080207">
              <a id="link_20080207" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080207,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811477}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Basic economic data such as GNP.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080211">
              <a id="link_20080211" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080211,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904563}); ">
               Europa World Yearbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Transportation systems, communication and media.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080215">
              <a id="link_20080215" href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/inter-natlinks/sd_natstat.asp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080215,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904587}); ">
               National Statistical Offices
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A directory of statistical offices of countries around the globe.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080225">
              <a id="link_20080225" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.portal.euromonitor.com/portal/server.pt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080225,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904123}); ">
               Passport Reference via Euromonitor
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. The "Consumer Lifestyles Reports" contain data and text on labor, income, population, media and communication systems, transportation, and distribution channels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080229">
              <a id="link_20080229" href="http://www.gouv.qc.ca/portail/quebec/pgs/commun/plansite/?lang=en" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080229,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20080198}); ">
               Quebec Portal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080269">
              <a id="link_20080269" href="http://www.state.gov/r/pa/ei/bgn/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080269,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20080269}); ">
               U.S. State Department Background Notes
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Current analysis of economy and politics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20080280">
              <a id="link_20080280" href="http://data.worldbank.org/topic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080280,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19905163}); ">
               World Bank
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Good for media and communication, internet use, science and technology, etc.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17032916">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17032916">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17032916">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           What about choosing a location?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17032916">
          <div id="boxatt17032916" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20080305">
              <a id="link_20080305" href="https://www.google.fr/webhp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080305,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20080173}); ">
               Google France
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search on your industry and country. Find out where existing establishments are to get a sense of local competition and how the business connects to the community.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17032926">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17032926">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17032926">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           What about advertising?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17032926">
          <div id="boxatt17032926" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20080309">
              <a id="link_20080309" href="http://next.srds.com/home" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080309,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20080309}); ">
               SRDS.com
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available via library subscription. One user at a time. Email kcannon@muhlenberg.edu for login and password.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17032934">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17032934">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17032934">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find current news from the country I am researching?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17032934">
          <div id="boxatt17032934" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20080324">
              <a id="link_20080324" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080324,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains press releases from most countries, or the region where a country is located.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17032941">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17032941">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17032941">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           And properties?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17032941">
          <div id="boxatt17032941" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20080333">

              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">

             <li id="link20080336">

              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Immobilier.
              </div>

               Kijiji Ville de Quebec
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">

             </li>
             <li id="link20080348">
              <a id="link_20080348" href="http://www.kijiji.ca/h-grand-montreal/80002?siteLocale=fr_CA" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080348,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20080348}); ">

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17033005">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I cite sources both within the text of my paper and in a bibliography?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17033005">
          <div id="boxatt17033005" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20080440">
              <a id="link_20080440" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20080440,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French for the Professions ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20080440}); ">
               Trexler Library's Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Documents
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
